actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality

official_title: To extend the deadlines under part I of the Federal Power Act for commencement of construction of two hydroelectric projects in the State of New York.

summary.text: Instructs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon licensee request, to extend the time period to commence the construction of projects numbered 4244 and 10648, for three consecutive two-year periods.Provides for reinstatement of expired licenses.

titles.title: To extend the deadlines under part I of the Federal Power Act for commencement of construction of two hydroelectric projects in the State of New York.
